Missouri_City.KRIV (TV): KRIV, virtual and UHF digital channel 26, is a Fox owned-and-operated television station licensed to Houston, Texas, United States. The station is owned by the Fox Television Stations subsidiary of 21st Century Fox, as part of a duopoly with MyNetworkTV owned-and-operated station KTXH (channel 20). The two stations share studio facilities in the Uptown section of Houston; KRIV's transmitter is located near Missouri City, Texas, in unincorporated northeastern Fort Bend County.
